code: import React from'react';import{useAuth}from'../contexts/AuthContext';import ArticleCard from'./ArticleCard';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Profile=()=>{const{user}=useAuth();if(!user){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loading",children:"Loading profile..."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{className:"profile-name",children:["Welcome, ",user.name,"!"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"profile-email",children:user.email})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{className:"saved-articles-title",children:["Your Saved Articles (",user.savedArticles.length,")"]}),user.savedArticles.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"no-articles",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"You haven't saved any articles yet."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Search for news and click \"Save\" to add articles to your profile!"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"articles-grid",children:user.savedArticles.map((article,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ArticleCard,{article:article},`${article.url}-${index}`))})]})]});};export default Profile;
